metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25825 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication for Linux which supports IP, USB and Analog cameras. Versionsprior to 1.36.33 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting. Log entries can beinjected into the database logs, containing a malicious referrer field.This is unescaped when viewing the logs in the web ui. This issue ispatched in version 1.36.33.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
